headline: The Vassal Team is happy to announce the release of Vassal {{version}}.
important: If you are using MacOS 14, please ensure you are using 14.4 or later, to avoid a bug in MacOS which prevents Vassal from starting.

Modules saved in {{version_feature}} are not openable by earlier versions of Vassal. We recommend keeping a backup copy of any pre-{{version_feature}} modules you plan to modify in {{version_feature}} until you've verified that everything works to your satisfaction.
Things may be broken which worked previously. If you find a new bug, please report it.

bug_fixes.desc: Prevent NPEs when checking for amount of physical memory

other.desc: Upgraded bundled Mac, x86_64 Windows Java to 24.0.1+9; aarch64 Windows Java to 24.0.1+11
Upgraded bundled x86 Windows Java to 21.0.7+9

new_features.desc: Add dice & random text button summary output property
Add Property ModuleGameFileName holding last opened game file name
Added Global Option to allow module developer to set the minimum JVM heap size when using the module

bug_fixes.desc: Reset map on a piece that has lost its map during undo
Show layers in hidden pieces to owner correctly
Don't crash if client disconnects just before trying to send a message
Suppress exceptions when establishing an MP3 audio stream
Place Marker no longer ignores Offsets for stackable pieces
Handle Exceptions cleanly in Module Search
Prevent pieces from dropping through to window beneath

improvements.desc: Fix a bad reference manual link for GKCs
Sleep() improvements - Remove artifacts on Macs amd improve performance when Sleep(0) used to refresh UI
Do not subject 'Load Continuation' to online restrictions
Prevent Checkbox Scenario Option switch description side option being forced on
Add Beanshell performance health warning to Text Label trait docs
Bring Reference Manual section on Extensions up to date
Place Marker no longer ignores Offsets for stackable pieces
Set the Mac bundle to prefer arm64
Improve fit of 'Fit to Height' zoom option on Macs
MacOS: Editor's shortcut for deleting components modified to Command+Delete on Mac, to prevent inadvertent use when a FileDialog is showing

other.desc: Prevent build failing if branch name contains slashes
